verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* end, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Core, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hidden.

Our \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* our refuge \w and|strong="H4428"\w* strength: \w a|strong="H4428"\w* helper \w in|strong="H4428"\w* troubles, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* found \w us|strong="H0559"\w* exceedingly.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* we \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w* fear, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* troubled; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mountains \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* removed \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sea.

\w Their|strong="H5921"\w* waters roared \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w were|strong="H2719"\w* troubled: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mountains \w were|strong="H2719"\w* troubled \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* strength.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* stream \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* river maketh \w the|strong="H5921"\w* city \w of|strong="H1697"\w* God joyful: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* most High hath sanctified \w his|strong="H5921"\w* own tabernacle.

God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w midst|strong="H3820"\w* thereof, \w it|strong="H8478"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* not \w be|strong="H3820"\w* moved: God \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w help|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H8478"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* morning early.

Nations \w were|strong="H0430"\w* troubled, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4438"\w* \w were|strong="H0430"\w* bowed down: \w he|strong="H0430"\w* uttered \w his|strong="H0430"\w* voice, \w the|strong="H0430"\w* earth trembled.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H0430"\w* armies \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* protector.

Come \w and|strong="H8055"\w* behold ye \w the|strong="H3605"\w* works \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord: what wonders \w he|strong="H4480"\w* hath \w done|strong="H3605"\w* upon earth,

Making wars \w to|strong="H4428"\w* cease even \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5324"\w* end \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5324"\w* earth. \w He|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* destroy \w the|strong="H5324"\w* bow, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* break \w the|strong="H5324"\w* weapons: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5324"\w* shield \w he|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* burn \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5324"\w* fire.

\w Be|strong="H0001"\w* still \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* am God; \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H0001"\w* exalted among \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H0001"\w* exalted \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* armies \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* protector.
